questionTitle: You are not allowed ________ in this carriage.
I think you'd better ________ before they return.
"I ________ you all," she said, as she ran out of the room in tears.
I'm sorry we're late; it's all my ________!
I chose these curtains because they are my ________ shade of red.
I wonder ________ like to travel by Concorde.
Two other ________ in his argument for his country's independence are worth a mention.
Several soldiers were ________ wounded in the battle. They needed a lot of help.
Bill's a lucky fellow, he always seems to fall on his ________.
________ experience of working in an office environment is essential for this job.
Only by shouting very loudly ________ a taxi to stop for her.
For a long time after the accident, he suffered from constant ________ in his back.
An enormous ________ of rubbish had built up in the factory yard over the years.
Experiments have proved that children can be instructed ________ swimming at a very early age.
Mark will come ________ home quite late.
I was instructed ________ drawing once upon a time.
How can you agree ________ such an idea when you are ignorant of the basic facts?
It was ________ to meet you.
Unexpectedly the lights ________ out and we were left in the darkness.
For this recipe to be successful, you ________ cook the meat for at least two hours in a moderate oven.
